text: Big-step Semantics (call-by-name) (fully static scope rules) Envp = (Proc = Stm x Var x Envy)* (z: Proc = Stm x Var x Envy is an element of the stack) = Structural Operational Semantics — Format: &,I1+,(S,6) > 0 (where IT € Envp, ...) by using capture avoiding substitution g E S ø0 = (S ) &, Il H; (call pe), 6) = & — 8,1-,(callp(e),6) > " p ¢ dom(n) (call-NAME-29) ———————— 7 = 7 7 &, Il H (call (e),6) > &
